short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Harvest time tracker which links your time logs to issues in supported trackers (Gitlab, GitHub, Jira and Zammad)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a button to track time in Harvest (https://www.getharvest.com/). For supported issue trackers, it will link your time logs to the issue in the current browser tab and pull in the issue number and title into the time log description.

Supported issue trackers are:

* GitHub
* Jira
* Gitlab
* Zammad
